A theater of delightfull recreation. Rowlands, Samuel, 1570?-1630?
72 p.
Printed for A. Iohnson., London : 1605.
"To the wel-affected reader" signed S.R. (Samuel Rowlandson -- Cf. STC 2nd ed.). Title within border representing a theater (McK. & Ferg. 236). Signatures: A-I⁴. Imperfect: p. 55-60 lacking. Reproduction of original in: Folger Shakespeare Library.
=======
